definition: gardenia/cape jasmine (Gardenia jasminoides)/same as 栀子

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: Her favourite essence smells like gardenias.
sentences.chinese: 她喜歡的香水聞起來像梔子花。

sentences.english: Gardenia opened and ups and downs, went to another Swallow.
sentences.chinese: 梔子花開了又落，燕子去了又來。

sentences.english: When being fragrant in the Cape jasmine flower, parting is in sight.
sentences.chinese: 每逢梔子花芬芳的時候，離別就是在即。

sentences.english: Spritz yourself up to smell like a bouquet of gardenias and you won’t get the chance to leave lipstick on his cheek.
sentences.chinese: 把自己噴的像一束梔子花是不會吻到男人臉頰的。

sentences.english: Her favorite essence smells like gardenias.
sentences.chinese: 她喜歡的香水聞起來象梔子花。

sentences.english: So many flowers, my favorite is the gardenia in front of my house.
sentences.chinese: 這麼多花，我最喜歡的就是我家門前的梔子花。

sentences.english: On muggy summer night, gardenia brought about memories in the South.
sentences.chinese: 悶熱的夏夜，梔子花帶來關於南方的回憶。

sentences.english: Now i want to talk story about gardenia .
sentences.chinese: 現在我想說一個關於梔子花的故事。

sentences.english: In the fall season, gardenia has its dance, beautiful, beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 在這飄零的季節，梔子花擁有它的舞姿，美麗，嬌豔。

sentences.english: The writer alwalys received a gardenia every day in summer from child to adult.
sentences.chinese: 作者從小到大每到夏天每天都會收到一支梔子花。

sentences.english: A gentle breeze blowing, gardenia on the dance floor, overflowing fragrance.
sentences.chinese: 一陣微風吹來，梔子花就翩翩起舞，香氣四溢。

sentences.english: Gardenia bustling quarter, down a lonesome land loss and natural.
sentences.chinese: 繁華一季的梔子花，落了一地的失落與寞然。

sentences.english: Following i will tell you a story of gardenia .
sentences.chinese: 接下來，我要講的是梔子花的故事。

sentences.english: That was the year the gardenias stopped coming.
sentences.chinese: 也正是從那一年起，再也沒人送來梔子花了。

definition: national grace, divine fragrance (idiom); an outstanding beauty
everything in the garden is lovely
